roleset.name: make familiar, recognizable, known
roleset.note: FAMILIARIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'familiarize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from familiarize.01-v)
FAMILIAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, familiarize.01. (from familiar.01-j)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [Subsequent meetings, initiated after the company and two of its units were briefly suspended from federal contracts,]-1 were held [*-1]-1 [*]-1 to familiarize Mr. Orr with the company's self-policing procedures and to disclose additional information, according to GE.

example.name: with PRD, arg2 topic
example.text: I had my dad, who is a chemist, smell it and he couldnt detect anything readily that-1 [*-1] was familiar to him as a toxic smell

example.name: both args, arg1 topic
example.text: I 'm not familiar with rhythmic gymnastics , but I know both gymnasts and dancers are prone to on - the - job injury -- and the effects of those injuries can add up .

roleset.name: overly friendly, personal
roleset.note: FAMILIAR-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from familiar.02-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: Well, don't you think she was being a little too familiar with your husband?
